testcase.name: TC28_kullanici hotelroomedit sayfasinda duzenleme yapar
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici koalapalace admin sayfasina gider...........................passed And kullanici kullaniciadi ve sifresini girer...............................passed Then kullanici giris islemini gerceklestirir................................passed Given user goes to hotelroomedit website "http://www.kaolapalace-qa-environment2.com/admin/HotelRoomAdmin/Edit?Id=148".passed And user clicks properties part.............................................passed And user selects "room prop1" part..........................................passed And user writes code "4444".................................................passed Then user writes as value "sistem bozuldu"..................................passed And user clicks save2 button................................................passed Then user asserts new record on properties..................................passed
